item.description: Select 'Yes' to allow the VPS to adjust recording timers based on broadcast Program Delivery Control (PDC) data. For this to work the service must provide reliable event PDC data.
Check for PDC availability on each service.
Set a time offset before a timer is due to start to allow VPS to scan for the latest event timing. Select '0' to disable this feature.
Select 'Yes' to wake the receiver from Shutdown prior to the recording start time to allow the PDC data to make last minute timer adjustments.
If an event is interrupted and divided into separate recordings, this feature will search for alternate broadcasts of the same event.
Select 'Yes' to set the VPS flag on all new timers by default.
Select 'Yes' to use PDC data, if available on the current service, to accurately stop the instant recording at the end of the event.
